warnings: Allergic reactions in patients with penicillin hypersensitivity.
drug_interactions: May interact with oral anticoagulants; monitor blood clotting tests.
precautions: Use with caution in severe renal impairment.

drug_interactions: Many antibiotics and antifungals can increase warfarin effect.
precautions: Careful use with drugs that modify clotting.

drug_interactions: CYP3A4 inhibitors can increase atorvastatin plasma concentrations.
precautions: Avoid strong CYP3A4 inhibitors; monitor liver enzymes.
